snippet: GENATT--Leslie. The Senior Executives and staff of Greater New York Mutual Insurance Company record with profound sorrow the passing of their dear friend and business associate, Les Genatt. Genatt V, LLC and its predecessor insurance agency has had a business relationship with our Company for over 50 years. A highly respected and experienced insurance broker, he was a compassionate and caring person loved by everyone who knew him. We shall miss his genial presence in our midst. We extend our deepest sympathy to his dear wife Judith, his sons Michael and Richard, and his brother Steve as well as the other members of the bereaved family. Elizabeth Heck, President & CEO Warren W. Heck, Chairman of the Board 1/3
lead_paragraph: GENATT--Leslie. The Senior Executives and staff of Greater New York Mutual Insurance Company record with profound sorrow the passing of their dear friend and business associate, Les Genatt. Genatt V, LLC and its predecessor insurance agency has had a business relationship with our Company for over 50 years. A highly respected and experienced insurance broker, he was a compassionate and caring person loved by everyone who knew him. We shall miss his genial presence in our midst. We extend our deepest sympathy to his dear wife Judith, his sons Michael and Richard, and his brother Steve as well as the other members of the bereaved family. Elizabeth Heck, President & CEO Warren W. Heck, Chairman of the Board 1/3
